concept.title: Shellbound Odyssey
concept.description: Embark on a perilous journey as a determined sea turtle, navigating treacherous waters and sandy shores to reach a new, idyllic beach. Avoid predators, gather vital resources, and overcome environmental challenges in this charming top-down 2D adventure.
concept.theme: Tropical island hopping with vibrant coral reefs and sun-drenched beaches.
concept.objective: Guide Sheldon the turtle from his current, dwindling beach to a legendary, untouched paradise on the other side of the archipelago.
mechanics: WASD movement for precise control of Sheldon.
Environmental interaction: pushable rocks, destructible seaweed barriers, currents that aid or hinder.
Resource management: collecting kelp for stamina and barnacle shells for temporary defensive boosts.
player_abilities: Swim: Basic forward movement through water and along the seabed.
Dive: Temporarily sink below surface-dwelling threats and access underwater shortcuts or collectibles.
Shell Retreat: Briefly become invulnerable by tucking into Sheldon's shell, but at the cost of mobility.

enemies.name: Pufferfish Swarm
enemies.behavior: Moves in predictable patterns, attempting to ram Sheldon. Touching them inflates them, causing minor damage.

enemies.name: Aggressive Seagull
enemies.behavior: Circles overhead, swooping down to peck at Sheldon when he surfaces or is on shallow sand. Can be scared off by a quick dash or powerup.

enemies.name: Grumpy Crab
enemies.behavior: Scuttles sideways along the beach and shallow water, snapping with its claws. Must be avoided or stunned.

enemies.name: Shark Pup
enemies.behavior: Patrols specific underwater areas with a lunge attack. Can be dodged with quick turns.

powerups.name: Kelp Boost
powerups.effect: Instantly restores a significant portion of Sheldon's stamina, allowing for longer sprints or dives.

powerups.name: Barnacle Armor
powerups.effect: Temporarily coats Sheldon's shell with hardened barnacles, absorbing one enemy hit without damage. Collectible barnacle shells grant multiple uses.

powerups.name: Current Rider
powerups.effect: Grants a temporary burst of speed by harnessing strong underwater currents, allowing Sheldon to quickly escape danger or cover distance.

concept.level_progression: Levels are structured as distinct island areas, each with a unique visual style and set of environmental challenges. Progression involves reaching a designated endpoint on each island, unlocking the next segment of the journey. Later levels introduce more complex enemy patterns and environmental hazards.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for collecting optional kelp clusters, finding hidden starfish, completing levels within a time bonus, and avoiding taking damage. A 'perfection' bonus is awarded for levels completed without a single hit.
concept.visual_style: A vibrant, colorful pixel art style with hand-drawn assets. Lush green foliage on beaches, sparkling blue and turquoise waters, and detailed coral formations. Sheldon himself is a charming, expressive sprite.
concept.sound_theme: Relaxing tropical ambient sounds (waves, seagulls, gentle breeze) mixed with upbeat, ukulele-driven melodies. Enemy encounters are accompanied by distinct, escalating sound cues, and powerups have satisfying 'chime' effects.

level_design.name: The Whispering Kelp Forest
level_design.description: Welcome to the tranquil, yet surprisingly perilous, kelp forest. This is where Sheldon first learns the basics of survival. Navigate through the dense kelp, discover vital resources, and face your first underwater adversaries.

objectives.description: Find the exit to the next area.

assets.player: A small, roundish pixelated turtle with a brown shell and a friendly green head and limbs. Big, expressive pixel eyes.

enemies.basic: A small, slow-moving pixelated crab with a red shell and two scuttling legs.
enemies.aggressive: A quick, spiky pixelated pufferfish, likely blue or purple, with puffed-out pixels.

powerups.health: A glowing, pixelated red apple or heart shape.
powerups.speed: A swirling, pixelated wind icon or a lightning bolt.

obstacles.wall: A solid block of pixelated brown or grey, representing a simple barrier.
obstacles.rock: A rounded, textured pixelated grey or brown shape, varying slightly in size.

assets.background: A horizontal gradient of sparkling blue to turquoise pixelated water, with green pixelated land and palm trees at the top.

ui_elements.score: A series of pixelated numbers, possibly with a gold coin icon.
ui_elements.health_bar: A red pixelated bar that depletes, likely alongside heart pixel icons.
